- Meets Age Requirement - Populated with Date the player will be eligible to sign a contract strictly by age 
- Birth Country * - Populated with data from Create New widget
- Birth Date * - Populated with data from Create New widget
- Level 1 Registered - Set to No
- Level 2 Registered - Set to No

- Registration Status - Set to Unregistered

- Middle Name - Blank Text Field
- Last Name - Populated with data from Create New widget
- Extended Last Name - Blank Text Field
- Middle Name N/A - Checkbox
- Extended Last Name N/A - Checkbox
- Roster First Name - Blank Text Field
- Twin Count - Blank Text Field
- Birth Country - Populated with data from Create New widget
- Birth City - Populated with data from Create New Widget 
- Birth Sector - Blank Text Field
- Participated in MLB showcase - Checkbox (Should be unchecked and uneditable by scout)
3. All fields should work appropriately

Blue notications should appear indicating the report was saved and submitted
